name: Circles - How Long Can You Last
name_original: Circles - How Long Can You Last
description:
In this simple and addicting arcade game your goal is to collect as many circles as you can while avoiding the enemy circles. The game game gets harder the longer you last! How long can you keep up!

Use power ups to get you out of tricky situations but watch out for the downgrades because they might ruin your game. See if you can get the high score!

- Drag your circle all around the screen
- Collect the black object
- Avoid the red objects
